headline.main: Lady Halifax Tells of 'Tidied-Up' London; Praises Housewives Who Carry On Dull Job

lead_paragraph: Although England is not suffering now a "dramatic blitz," the present phase of the battle is just as difficult for the people there, Lady Halifax, wife of the British Ambassador to the United States, declared yesterday.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: ENGLISH-SPEAKING UNION OF THE U S
